Bash(PGPASSWORD='SaviorOfSong1!' psql "postgresql://postgres.kmsngqbysqbsubexhwff@aws-1-ap-southeast-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "
-- Delete in order respecting foreign keys
TRUNCATE TABLE 
    exercise_history,
    personal_records,
    session_sets,
    session_exercises,
    workout_sessions,
    program_days,
    programs,
    exercise_target_sets,
    section_items,
    workout_sections,
    workout_templates,
    weight_logs,
    users
CASCADE;

-- Delete custom exercises (keep system ones)
DELETE FROM exercises WHERE is_system = FALSE;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SaviorOfSong1!' psql "postgresql://postgres.kmsngqbysqbsubexhwff@aws-1-ap-southeast-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as count, is_system FROM exercises GROUP BY is_system;")
